jdbcService.sql: select distinct * from ~nodes n join ~group_roles gr on gr.node_id = n.id join ~actions a on gr.role_id = gr.role_id join ~action_roles ar on ar.action_id = a.id join ~user_groups ug on ug.group_id = gr.group_id where a.name = :action and ug.user_id = any(:userIds) and (:componentId is null or n.component_id = any(:componentId)) and n.enabled = true and (:q is null or lower(n.name) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(n.title) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(n.description) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%')
